item.title: How insurance companies price electric car insurance
item.description: Image courtesy of Hyundai We often get asked how insurance companies price electric car (or any automobile) insurance policies. They don’t invent the numbers, but go down a predefined checklist.

item.title: Why EV insurance should cost less than normal car insurance
item.description: Image Courtesy of Mercedes Benz Your average electric car will have more advanced safety features than your average gas powered car and is therefore cheaper to insure.

item.title: How much does electric car insurance actually cost in 2019?
item.description: Image Courtesy of Nissan There is a lot of disinformation out there that electric cars are more expensive than ICE vehicles to insure. A lot of this FUD (fear, uncertainty and doubt) is most likely spread by comapanies wanting electric cars to fail.
